title: Ed Sheeran Joins The Bert Show!
description:
Ed Sheeran joins The Bert Show to talk juggling life as a star and Father, touring for the first time in FIVE years, and how important it is for artists to protect their mental health.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
